name: House Spider Survival Simulator 3D
description:
Ever dreamed to live a life of a little wild predator – home web-spinning spider? Then this exciting animal simulator is made exactly for you! Dip into this fantastic micro world, explore the large house full of dangerous humans and their pets, find a mate and have fun playing House Spider Survival Simulator 3D!
Continue your house spider clan! Create your net to entice flies and other victims and feed your little family! Be careful and protect each egg to give birth to your heirs! Don’t forget that your first and foremost mission is to survive, so be attentive! Use your poison to paralyze your rivals and have fun with House Spider Survival Simulator 3D!
Keep an eye on your home spider’s health, energy, water and food indicators – if one of them drops, your chances to survive and mate will drop too! Earn points to customize your spider and power up its skills! Black widow, golden orb weaver, bird’s eating spider, European garden spider, Sydney funnel-web spider or even tarantula – which skin would you choose? Unlock them all!
This large human’s house is full of dangers! But don’t be afraid too much, ‘cause you are one of the most horrible arthropods ever! Fight for your life against other spiders or make friends with them – this choice is up to you! Try to find your mate in this large inhospitable place, lead it to your nest in the darkest corner of the house and raise a family of little spiderlings!

House Spider Survival Simulator 3D features:
• Realistic poisonous spider simulator
• Opportunity to mate and raise up little heirs
• Wide range of dangerous predators and insects
• Amazing 3D graphics
Pave your way through the large human’s place being a beautiful home web-spinning spider! Run forward and enjoy the micro world in House Spider Survival Simulator 3D!
